email_content:
Hi Sarah,

I hope you're doing well. Here's a quick update on our project:

• All current milestones have been met on schedule.
• The team has integrated the new algorithm into the trading platform, and it's now in final testing.
• No significant issues have been reported at this stage.
• Upcoming focus: creating documentation and training materials for the client workshop.

Let me know if you have any questions or need additional details.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
